job_title: in Daytona Beach, FL
pros: Absolutely no pros except you may be allowed to set your own work schedule if you supervisor is not a complete you know what..don't work here!
cons:
This is the absolutely worst place to work in America. Do NOT work here unless no one else (including McDonald's) is hiring. Nepotism is king here.  If you are well liked you will be promoted and given raises regardless of your level of Education and skill set. If you are disliked, you will be harassed, manipulated, and overworked until you walkout in sheer frustration or terminated.

My department chair does NOT have the skill set to do well in the position and my very fat Dean is petty, abusive, and manipulative. There is absolutely no respect for faculty. I feel like I work on a slave plantation. The administration is bloated beyond measure. At last count there are 11 BPs with only 3400 students. The faculty are severely overworked and severely underpaid and instead of appreciating the the service and dedication of the faculty the administration acts they are doing you a favor by giving you a job. The administration has no regard for policy or procedure.

cons: The overarching model was unorganized.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Daytona Beach, FL
pros:
Benefits are good
Get the summer off (Mid April  - August) unless you want to work summer school
A week off for Spring Break
A week off for Thanksgiving
Three weeks off for Christmas
cons:
Pay is minimal
Too many top players making over $100,000+ and doing nothing.  How many provosts do you need
Will lay off working faculty to continue hiring VP's and other high salary personnel
Clicks - if you're not part of them, you're out
Not student-focused as they should be
Politicians at best - can't believe or count on anything they say or do.  It will change, and not in your favor.
Mis-appropriation of funds

job_title: Public Safety Officer in Daytona Beach, FL
pros: Nearby restaurants, many nice students and staff, very large, growing private campus. New cafeteria with very good food.
cons: High turnover poor management and administration due to family approach to doing business. If you're not part of the Family you are an outsider and this is a historically black college university which is not understanding of other ethnicities. If you value hard work honesty high moral character you will not fit in here. In other words if you don't understand the clique environment at this university no one is going to tell you. Instead there will mock you and conspire against you until they have grounds to terminate you.
